subject: Personal Finance
title: The Law of Supply and Demand
description: A 60-second lesson on The Law of Supply and Demand.

hook.text: When concert tickets are scarce and fans are many, prices skyrocket. That's supply and demand.

buildup.text: Supply is how much sellers offer. Demand is how much buyers want. Price balances the two.

discovery.text: When demand exceeds supply, prices rise. When supply exceeds demand, prices fall.

twist.text: This law explains everything from housing costs to the price of avocados after a drought.

climax.text: Governments that try to override supply and demand â€” with price caps or floors â€” often create shortages.

punchline.text: Supply meets demand at a price.

quiz.question: What happens when demand exceeds supply?
